name: Kousoku Shikou Shogi-Oh
overview: Kousoku Shikou Shogi-Oh ("Fast Thinking Shogi Emperor") is a shogi game for the Super Famicom. The player competes against four different characters in either a standard shogi mode or a challenge mode that creates scenarios with specific tiles and tasks the player to win them. Access would go on to produce another Super Famicom shogi game - Habu Meijin no Omoshiro Shogi - a week later.
